label: 一字頂輪王
対訳語: Sk. Ekāksara-usnīsacakra [with a dot under all s"s]"
本: The Weaving of Mantra:  Kūkai and the Construction of Esoteric Buddhist Discourse . Columbia University Press . 1999
見出し読み: いちじちょうりんのう
説明文: The Buddha of the Single Word Whose Crown is the Wheel of Dharma, who manifests himself as the cakravartin, world-conqueror, personifying the unexcelled wisdom shared by all the Tathāgatas, their secret identity with the Dharmakāya (p. 266).
